attributes.action: Allow people 21-24 years old to claim housing benefit. This would ease homelessness and ultimately lower crime in our areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many young homeless people who are not seen as a priority for housing by the council are being forced into homelessness and rough sleeping because they are denied housing benefit purely because of their age.

This creates severe and unnessaray hardship on many young people who otherwise would have no problem maintaining a property. Whats the difference between a 24 and 25 year old?

Councils refuse to house single homeless people and then complain why there is so much crime in their areas. These people need a roof over their head and some may resort to crime in order to survive and feed themselves.

As we all know you cannot claim benefit unless you have a permananent adresss. 

Please sign.
